languageKey.label: Akisys: Proximity Image Gallery
Creates a grid-based image gallery with proximity-based thumbnail hovers and an integrated lightbox.
Required: Thumbnail dimension size in px, each image will have equal height and width.
Optional: Choose an image file as gallery background.
Optional: Width of the overall Gallery container in pixel.
Optional: Number of Columns to use for the grid, rows adapt automatically.
Optional: Enforce maximum thumbnail dimension.\n Otherwise thumbnails will adapt to maximum content width without any grid columns restriction.
Optional: Lightbox maximum width size in px.
Optional: Lightbox maximum height size in px.
Optional: Change the opacity of the thumbnails grid.
